title: Share of global net sales of Luxottica by geographical area 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
The difference of Share of net sales between the highest and lowest Geographical area is 56.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of net sales for 5 number of Geographical areas.
The Share of net sales is appeared to be the highest at Geographical area North America and lowest at Geographical area Rest of the world.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
The difference of Share of net sales between the highest and lowest Geographical area is 56.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
Geographical area North America has the highest Share of net sales and Rest of the world has the lowest Share of net sales.
Second maximum Share of net sales is found at Geographical area Europe.
Geographical area Rest of the world has 29.0 times less Share of net sales than Geographical area North America which is the highest.

Geographical area North America is higher than any other Geographical areas with value 58.0, followed by Europe, and Asia-Pacific. Down to Geographical area Rest of the world with the lowest value 2.0.
The Geographical area North America tends to be 2.9 percent higher than average.
The Share of net sales is 100.0 if we add up values of all Geographical areas.
